miniapp.name: Crypto Realm
miniapp.subtitle: On-Chain MMO RPG on Base
miniapp.description: Explore, fight, craft, and earn in a fully decentralized medieval MMO RPG built on Base & Farcaster.
miniapp.longDescription: Crypto Realm is an on-chain MMO lite game inspired by Albion Online and RuneScape. Built on Base blockchain and Farcaster, it combines RPG gameplay with token rewards ($REALM ERC-20), NFT characters (ERC-721), and NFT items (ERC-1155). Features include PvE battles, world bosses, guilds, and seasonal events.
